text:
A 52-year-old man was fatally knocked down by a train between Pettavaithalai and Kulithalai in the Tiruchi–Karur broad gauge section on Monday evening.

The name of the victim was given as V. Karuppaiah (52) of Mettu Marudhur in Kulithalai.

Railway Police sources said Karuppaiah was mentally ill.

The sources said he was knocked down by a train while crossing the track. The Government Railway Police, Tiruchi, have registered a case.
title: Train knocks down man near Kulithalai
